components.DashboardModerators.ButtonCha.description: Body for the modal to promote or revoke the defined user to moderator, to ask the user to confirm this action.
components.DashboardModerators.ButtonCha.message: Etes-vous certains que vous souhaitez poursuivre cette action ?

components.DashboardModerators.ButtonCha.description: Title for the modal to promote the defined user to moderator of the forum.
Title for the modal to revoke the defined user to moderator of the forum.

components.DashboardModerators.ListModer.description: Present the block where the list of moderator is, sum up information on number of moderator compare to amount of total users that could be moderators. Appears just above results
components.DashboardModerators.ListModer.message: {moderatorCount, number} {moderatorCount, plural, one {modérateur} other {modérateurs}} sur {userCount, number} {userCount, plural, one {utilisateur} other {utilisateurs}}

components.DashboardModerators.Modal.clo.description: Text for the button to close the modal to promote or revoke a user to moderator

components.DashboardModerators.Moderator.description: Title for the link to access a user's profil.

components.DashboardModerators.SearchMod.description: Present the block where the input to search students is, sum up information on number of students left that aren' moderators. Appears just above search input
components.DashboardModerators.SearchMod.message: Ajoutez un nouveau modérateur au forum : {studentCount, number} {studentCount, plural, one {élève} other {élèves}}

components.DashboardModerators.SearchMod.description: CTA for students to promote moderators
CTA for moderators to be revoked
Placeholder text displayed in the search field when it is empty.
